item.ars_zero.ars_zero_staff.desc: A creative magical staff that can cast spells in three phases: Begin, Tick, and End. All glyphs are available.
ars_zero.glyph_desc.glyph_conjure_voxel_: Conjures a small voxel entity that persists for a duration. The voxel is a quarter the size of a normal block and does not collide with anything. Can be augmented with AOE, Pierce, Extend Time, and Sensitive.
ars_zero.glyph_desc.glyph_temporal_conte: A cast method that provides access to context from previous staff phases. When used in Tick or End phases, it will target the entity or block that was stored in the temporal context from previous phases.
ars_zero.glyph_desc.glyph_translate_effe: Maintains the relative position of a target entity to the caster. The entity will follow the caster's movement and rotation, staying in the same relative position. Duration can be extended with augments.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.temporal_context_: A cast method that provides access to context from previous staff phases. When used in Tick or End phases, it will target the entity or block that was stored in the temporal context from previous phases.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.near_form: Casts the spell at a short distance in front of you (1 block by default). Perfect for conjuring entities or blocks without needing to aim at something. Distance can be adjusted with Amplify/Dampen.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.translate_effect: When used with Temporal Context Form in TICK phase, keeps the target entity locked to the same position on your screen. The entity will follow your look direction and movement.
ars_nouveau.augment_desc.translate_effec: Increases the distance from the player
Decreases the distance from the player
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.push_effect: Pushes the target entity in the direction you're looking. Unlike Knockback, this respects your full look direction including up and down. Perfect for launching entities carried with Translate.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.enlarge_effect: Gradually enlarges the target entity over time. Works best with Voxel entities when used with Temporal Context Form in the TICK phase. The entity grows by 0.5% per tick by default, with a maximum size of 16 blocks.
